\sin^2 x + \cos^2 x = 1, \quad \tan x = \frac{\sin x}{\cos x}, \quad \cot x = \frac{\cos x}{\sin x}

completion.content: sin^2(x) + cos^2(x) = 1, quad tan(x) = sin(x)/cos(x), quad cot(x) = cos(x)/sin(x)

複雑な極限: 複数の極限

LaTeX→Typst
\lim_{x \to 0} \frac{\sin x}{x} = 1, \quad \lim_{n \to \infty} \frac{1}{n} = 0, \quad \lim_{h \to 0} \frac{f(x+h) - f(x)}{h} = f'(x)

completion.content: lim_(x → 0) sin(x)/x = 1, quad lim_(n → ∞) 1/n = 0, quad lim_(h → 0) (f(x+h) - f(x))/h = f'(x)
